title: AMSIS
blurb: Australian Marine Spatial Information System (AMSIS) is a web based interactive mapping and decision support system that improves access to integrated government and non-government information in the Australian Marine Jurisdiction. The data has been sourced from Geoscience Australia, other Australian government agencies and some industry sources. AMSIS also contains the offshore mineral locations data that was used to create the Offshore Minerals Map. Information in this application should not be relied upon as the sole source of information for commercial and operational decisions. AMSIS should not be used for navigational purposes.

headerConfig.title: Applying geoscience to Australia's most important challenges

maps.title: Seas and Submerged Lands Act 1973
maps.previewDescription: An Act relating to Sovereignty in respect of certain Waters of the Sea and in respect of the Airspace over, and the Sea bed and Subsoil beneath, those Waters and to Sovereign Rights in respect of the Continental Shelf and the Exclusive Economic Zone and to certain rights of control in respect of the Contiguous Zone.

maps.title: Offshore Petroleum and Greenhouse Gas Storage Act 2006
maps.previewDescription: An Act about petroleum exploration and recovery, and the injection and storage of greenhouse gas substances, in offshore areas, and for other purposes.

maps.title: Treaties with East Timor
maps.previewDescription: Treaties in force between the Commonwealth of Australia and the Democratic Republic of East Timor.

maps.title: Treaties with France
maps.previewDescription: Treaties in force between the Commonwealth of Australia and the Republic of France.

maps.title: Treaties with Indonesia
maps.previewDescription: Treaties both in force and not yet in force between the Commonwealth of Australia and the Republic of Indonesia.

maps.title: Treaties with New Zealand
maps.previewDescription: Treaties in force between the Commonwealth of Australia and New Zealand.

maps.title: Treaties with Papua New Guinea
maps.previewDescription: Treaties in force between the Commonwealth of Australia and the Independent State of Papua New Guinea.

maps.title: Treaties with Solomon Islands
maps.previewDescription: Treaties in force between the Commonwealth of Australia and the Government of the Solomon Islands.

maps.title: Fisheries Legacy Services
maps.previewDescription: The Act relating to the management of Fisheries is The Fisheries Management Act 1991.

maps.title: Regulatory Legacy Services
maps.previewDescription: Map of Australian Maritime Regulatory features, featuring data from supplied by the Australian Maritime Safety Authority

maps.title: Environment Legacy Services
maps.previewDescription: Map of Australian Maritime Environment features, featuring data from supplied by the Department of Environment, legacy and new

maps.title: Australian Ocean Governance and Relevant Legislation
maps.previewDescription: This information provides an overview of legislation and background information which relates to data found in the Australian Marine Spatial Information System (AMSIS).

tags.description: The primary task for maritime boundary determination is the delineation of the baseline from which the outer limits of the various maritime zones are measured. This TSB consists of several components including normal baseline, straight baselines and bay and river closing lines.
tags.title: Maritime Boundaries

tags.description: Petroleum and mineral resource blocks as described by Australian legislation.
tags.title: Offshore Petroleum and Minerals

tags.description: The legacy AMSIS contains data from 2006-2014. The legacy data will moved into regular AMSIS as new services and data are supplied by contributing agencies.
tags.title: Legacy AMSIS
